author: Vexed (Vexed#9000)
description: Make all prefixes and commands case insensitive (so that something like !Ping works). This will have a negative performance impact.
end_user_data_statement: This cog does not persistently store data or metadata about users.
install_msg:
Thanks for installing! This cog is **active whenever it is loaded** and has no commands. Try out `[p]piNG`! (once you load the cog)

Please be aware that this cog:
1) may affect other cogs that call or change bot.get_context
2) has a negative performance impact
3) may break at any time

This cog has docs! Check them out at <https://go.vexcodes.com/c/caseinsensitive>
name: CaseInsensitive
